sentences.sContent: She had already tried emotional blackmail (=  tried to make him feel guilty  ) to stop him leaving.
sentences.sCn: 她试过以情相迫，不让他离开。

synos.tran: 勒索，[法]敲诈；勒索所得之款

trans.tranCn: 勒索，敲诈；勒索所得之款
trans.tranOther: when someone tries to get money from you or make you do what they want by threatening to tell other people your secrets
